lines.name: APOC
lines.line_text: hey oracle, did you know the warriors used to play there?

lines.name: ORACLE
lines.line_text: yeah but now they play at chase

lines.name: APOC
lines.line_text: i feel bad everyone is leaving oakland

lines.name: ORACLE
lines.line_text: eh its alright, the raiders suck anyways

lines.name: APOC
lines.line_text: bang bang niner gang baby oracle
